metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8537 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
app/views/journals/index.builder in Redmine before 2.6.9, 3.0.x before 3.0.7, and 3.1.x before 3.1.3 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information by viewing an Atom feed.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8537` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

redmine - 3.2.0-1
redmine-mysql - 3.2.0-1
redmine-pgsql - 3.2.0-1
redmine-sqlite - 3.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redmine package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.0-1').
